maqras.text: (God commands the angels:) "Gather together all those who committed the greatest wrong (by obstinately associating partners with God), and their (devilish) comrades, and all that they used to worship (of idols, and the rebellious among humankind and jinn)
Apart from God, and lead them to the path of the Blazing Flame
And arrest them there, for they must be questioned (concerning their deeds in the world)
But, what is the matter with you that you do not help one another (to escape punishment)
Instead, on that Day they will be in utter submission (without the least sign of arrogance)
And they turn to one another, exchanging words (of blame) with one another
They (the ones led) say (to the leaders): "It was you who used to come to us affecting (pretending to be our well-wishers and offering falsehood as truth)
They (the leaders) say: "No! Rather, you yourselves were not believers, (with no inclination and intention to believe)
And we had no power over you (to compel you to disbelieve). But you yourselves were a rebellious people
So our Lord’s word (of punishment) has come true against us. (In justice) we are bound to taste it
So then, (though without power to compel, if) we did mislead you (and cause you to rebel), for surely we ourselves had been lost in error
So, on that Day they will be associated together in (suffering) the punishment
That is how We will deal with the disbelieving criminals
For when they were told that there is no deity but God, they would grow arrogant and reject it
And they would say, "Are we to give up our deities for the sake of a mad poet
No! Rather he has brought (you) the truth and confirms those (Messengers) sent (before him)
You are surely bound to taste the painful punishment (on account of your attitude and actions)
And you will not be recompensed but for what you were doing
But not so God’s servants endowed with sincerity in faith and practicing the Religion
For those there is (in Paradise) a provision specially prepared
Fruits (as the reward of their life in the world); and they will be highly honored
In Gardens of bounty and blessing
Sitting on thrones, face to face
A cup will be passed round among them with a drink from a pure, gushing spring
Clear, delightful for those who drink it
Free from any headiness or harm, and they will not suffer intoxication from it
And with them will be pure, chaste-eyed spouses (whose glances are fixed on them only), most beautiful of eye
(As free from any ugliness, and) untouched, as if they were hidden (ostrich) eggs
They will turn to one another, indulging in friendly talk
One of them speaks thus: "I had a close companion
Who used to ask me, ‘Are you really one of those who confirm the truth (of what the Messenger teaches us about the Last Judgment)
‘Will we, when we die and have become dust and bones – will we then really be (raised and) put under judgment?’
He (the speaker) will say: "Would you like to look (into Hell to see him)
He will look down and see him in the midst of the Blazing Flame
He will say: "By God, you would nearly have caused me to perish
Had it not been for the grace of my Lord, I would certainly have been among those arraigned (in the Flame for punishment)
(Then, turning to his companions, he will say:) "We are not to experience death any more, are we
Except the former death (that we experienced in leaving the world), and we are not to be punished
(Then) this is most certainly the supreme triumph
For the like of this, then, let those who will labor (to a goal) labor
Is this what is good as a welcome or the tree of Zaqqum
We have made it (that tree) a means of trial and punishment for the wrongdoers (who associate partners with God)
It is a tree growing in the heart of the Blazing Flame
Its fruits are like the heads of satans
So, most surely, they will eat of it and fill up their bellies with it
Then, for them will be boiling water (to mix with the zaqqum in their bodies)
And afterwards, they are bound to return to the Blazing Flame again
Assuredly they found their forefathers on the wrong path
And yet, they rush (after them) in their footsteps
Indeed, most of those (communities) that lived before them went astray
Though We had sent among them warners (with Our guidance)
So see how was the outcome for those who were warned (but paid no heed)
Except God’s servants, endowed with sincerity in faith and practicing the Religion
And Noah (just such a servant and warner) had called upon Us (for help), and how excellent We are in answering (prayer)
We saved him and (his true followers among) his family and people from the mighty distress
And We caused his offspring to endure (on the earth)
And We left for him among later-comers (until the end of time this greeting and remembrance of him and his Message)
Peace be upon Noah among all beings
Thus do We reward those devoted to doing good as if seeing God
Surely he was one of Our truly believing servants
As for the others (who opposed him), We caused them to drown
